document_data.mainbody:
The Sky Lizard Mountains, also known as the Luo Peaks, was a branch of the Peaks of Flame that jutted toward Thindol on the Chultan Peninsula.
The towering peaks showed signs of wind erosion.
thumb|300px|A late 15 century DR map of Chult showing the Sky Lizard Mountains in the southeast.These mountains were found in southeastern Chult near the border of Thindol and Samarach. Along with the Sanrach Mountains to the south, they formed the mountainous border of the Chultengar and the Valley of Dread,
